section.p:
This template represents the outcome of care resulting from the interventions used to treat the patient. In the Care Planning workflow, the judgment about how well the person is progressing towards the goal is based on the observations made about the status of the patient with respect to interventions performed in the pursuit of achieving that goal.
Often thought of as an "actual outcome", the Outcome Observation may be related to goals, progression toward goals, and the associated interventions. For example, an observation outcome of a blood oxygen saturation level of 95% is related to the goal of "Maintain Pulse Ox greater than 92", which in turn is related to the health concern of respiratory insufficiency and the problem of pneumonia. The template makes use of the Entry Reference (templateId:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122) to reference the interventions and goals defined elsewhere in the Care Plan CDA instance.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-31221, CONF:1098-31222 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.144"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31219)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-31220)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31223)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-32746)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1098-32747)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31553)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31224, CONF:1098-31225, CONF:1098-32465)
The following entryRelationship represents the relationship between an Outcome Observation and a Goal Observation. Because the Goal Observation is already described in the CDA document instance's Goals section, rather than repeating the full content of the Goal Observation, the Entry Reference template can be used to reference this entry.
Contains @typeCode="GEVL" GEVL
Conforms to Entry Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122)

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31427, CONF:1098-31428, CONF:1098-31430)
The following entryRelationship represents the relationship between an Outcome Observation and a Progress Toward Goal Observation (Outcome Observation SUPPORTS Progress Toward Goal Observation). In the Care Planning workflow, the judgment about how well the person is progressing towards the goal is based on the observations made about the status of the patient with respect to interventions performed in the pursuit of achieving that goal.
Contains @typeCode="SPRT" SPRT
Conforms to Progress Toward Goal Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.110)
The Progress Toward Goal Observation entryRelationship, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-31429)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31688, CONF:1098-31689, CONF:1098-31690)
Where an Outcome Observation needs to reference an Intervention Act already described in the CDA document instance, rather than repeating the full content of the Intervention Act, the Entry Reference template may be used to reference this entry.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Entry Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference such that it (CONF:1098-32763)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" (CONF:1098-32764)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument, where its type is External Document Reference (CONF:1098-32765)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32782)
Conforms to Entry Relationship from CDA
The entryReference for the entryRelationship which contains @typeCode="GEVL" and contains an entryReference template SHALL reference an instance of a Goal Observation template (CONF:1098-32461)
The entryReference for the entryRelationship which contains @typeCode="RSON" and contains an entryReference template SHALL reference an instance of an Intervention Act template (CONF:1098-32462)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31219)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-31220)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-31223)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-32746)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1098-32747)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31553)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31224, CONF:1098-31225, CONF:1098-32465)
Contains @typeCode="GEVL" GEVL
Conforms to Entry Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122)
The following entryRelationship represents the relationship between an Outcome Observation and a Goal Observation. Because the Goal Observation is already described in the CDA document instance's Goals section, rather than repeating the full content of the Goal Observation, the Entry Reference template can be used to reference this entry.

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31427, CONF:1098-31428, CONF:1098-31430)
Contains @typeCode="SPRT" SPRT
Conforms to Progress Toward Goal Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.110)
The Progress Toward Goal Observation entryRelationship, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-31429)
The following entryRelationship represents the relationship between an Outcome Observation and a Progress Toward Goal Observation (Outcome Observation SUPPORTS Progress Toward Goal Observation). In the Care Planning workflow, the judgment about how well the person is progressing towards the goal is based on the observations made about the status of the patient with respect to interventions performed in the pursuit of achieving that goal.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31688, CONF:1098-31689, CONF:1098-31690)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Entry Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122)
Where an Outcome Observation needs to reference an Intervention Act already described in the CDA document instance, rather than repeating the full content of the Intervention Act, the Entry Reference template may be used to reference this entry.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] reference such that it (CONF:1098-32763)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFR" (CONF:1098-32764)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] externalDocument, where its type is External Document Reference (CONF:1098-32765)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32782)
Conforms to Entry Relationship from CDA
The Progress Toward Goal Observation entryRelationship, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-31429)
The entryReference for the entryRelationship which contains @typeCode="GEVL" and contains an entryReference template SHALL reference an instance of a Goal Observation template (CONF:1098-32461)
The entryReference for the entryRelationship which contains @typeCode="RSON" and contains an entryReference template SHALL reference an instance of an Intervention Act template (CONF:1098-32462)

entry.xref: Health Status Evaluations And Outcomes Section

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.144"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.144"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.144"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="368967879"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <text>Text Value</text> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="1582800313"/> <code code="574460956"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <entryRelationship/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.122"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.110"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="592378128"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="886535881"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <reference typeCode="REFR"> <externalDocument classCode="DOCCLIN" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.115"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="419663901"/> <code code="1187158160"/> <text>Text Value</text> <setId root="MDHT" extension="1f3f46f6-e833-4adc-a576-57108f5396b6"/> <versionNumber value="1"/> </externalDocument> </reference> </observation>
